description: A simple Twitter clone application allowing users to create accounts, post tweets, follow other users, and view their feeds.
features_description:
- User authentication (signup, login)
- Create and post tweets (text only)
- Follow/unfollow other users
- View a feed of tweets from users you follow
- View profiles of other users and their tweets

fields.name: email
fields.docs: The user's email address used for login

fields.name: following
fields.docs: List of user IDs that this user is following

schema_tables.name: tweets
schema_tables.docs: Stores all tweets posted by users

fields.name: author
fields.docs: The ID of the user who posted this tweet

fields.name: text
fields.docs: The text content of the tweet
